column2: lm(log_brain_wt ~ body_wt + gestation + life_span, data = mammals),
lm(log_brain_wt ~ body_wt + gestation + life_span + total_sleep, data = mammals))

Model 1: log_brain_wt ~ body_wt
Model 2: log_brain_wt ~ body_wt + gestation
Model 3: log_brain_wt ~ body_wt + gestation + life_span
Model 4: log_brain_wt ~ body_wt + gestation + life_span + total_sleep
